frameDefinitions: Some Protection prevents a Danger from harming an Asset.
An Agent matches location with an Entity in order to fulfill some  Purpose.
This frame concerns people being in an altered mental state that is induced by an Intoxicant.
A Traveller leaves from or dismounts a Vehicle.
A Guest stays for a time at a Location, which is not his or her permanent residence, for some Duration.
A Traveller boards a Vehicle that they intend to use as a means of transportation either as a passenger or as a driver.
frameExamples: The rubber on her sneakers <t>protected</t> her from the mud.
I ca n't remember how many times he <t>visited</t> ! DNI
I usually <t>stay</t> with my aunt at her summer house when I go to Seville.
On the 5th of December, 1834, we <t>embarked</t> on board the merchant ship Hellespont.
listRoleDefinitions: The person, entity, or action that prevents harm to an <fen>Asset</fen>.
A situation that could damage the <fen>Asset</fen>.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Protection</fen> which might be lost or damaged.
The time when the <fen>Danger</fen> threatens.
The place where the <fen>Danger</fen> threatened the <fen>Asset</fen>.
The sentient entity that is temporarily with the <fen>Entity</fen> in order to fulfil some <fen>Purpose</fen>.

The physical entity that is permanently associated with entities or characteristics that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to use for some <fen>Purpose</fen>.  During the visit, the <fen>Agent</fen> matches location with the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time at which a visit is made.
A description of the position of the <fen>Agent</fen> during the visit.
The mental state of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is changed by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen> .
The <fen>Intoxicant</fen> alters the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s mental experience.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes intoxicated.
The <fen>Traveller</fen> is the entity which disembarks from the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the means of conveyance that the <fen>Traveller</fen> disembarks from.
When the disembarking of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Traveller</fen> disembarks from the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Guest</fen> remains for a relatively short period of time in the <fen>Location</fen>.
The <fen>Location</fen> where the <fen>Guest</fen> spends a short amount of time.
The length of time that the <fen>Guest</fen> remains at the <fen>Location</fen>.
The <fen>Host</fen> is living at the <fen>Location</fen> on a permanent basis, and is allowing the <fen>Guest</fen> to stay there.
The time at which the temporary stay takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> indicates the larger physical setting of the temporary stay.
The <fen>Traveller</fen> is the entity which boards the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the intended means of conveyance of the <fen>Traveller</fen>.
When the boarding of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Traveller</fen> boards the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The tabloid's deal with the woman</fex> shielded Schwarzenegger.

Other nations tended to muffle or modulate their occasional annoyance with the
country that was their shield <fex>against the Soviet threat</fex>.
Almost 10 years later, that agreement insulated <fex>Microsoft</fex> from liability on copyright claims over the graphical user interface (GUI).
Regardless of the distribution media, USPTO information is safeguarded <fex>before, during, and after dissemination</fex> from improper access and modification.
To make his way on a foreign soil, he needed different guardians from those that protected him <fex>in his own birthplace</fex> .
<fex>We</fex> got off at the wrong bus stop.
The victim stopped the tractor and dismounted <fex>from it</fex>.
<fex>Yesterday</fex>, we alighted onto this tiny hilly island, site of a Singaporean October festival.
Originally, <fex>we</fex> planned on rooming with our relatives in Reno.
Originally we planned on staying <fex>at the Hilton</fex>.
My wife and have just returned from a <fex>two day</fex> stay at Ocean Key.
You should avoid staying <fex>with old college buddies</fex> when on business trips.
<fex>In London</fex>, I stayed at a hotel.
At approximately 07:30 hours <fex>we</fex> emplaned in England and after circling to gather other units that made up the 1st Airborne Army, we headed for the Rhine.
When he had mounted <fex>the horse</fex>, his armour glittered in the sun, and he looked so brave and handsome.
Therese entrained <fex>at 9am on 4 October</fex> for the Brandhoek area. .
